entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:13 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets or freezing rain beginning early this morning then changing to freezing rain near noon. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of freezing rain and a thunderstorm this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 8. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
